Protocols/ElementRenderable.html#/s:vP8U.name: topLevelElement
Protocols/ElementRenderable.html#/s:vP8U.abstract: The element the is at the top level for the object. Example: If there is a form, the top level element would be the UIElement that is form.

Protocols/ElementRenderable.html.name: ElementRenderable
Protocols/ElementRenderable.html.abstract: Designates an object as capable of being rendered into HTML.

Enums/LoginFormType.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit1.name: email
Enums/LoginFormType.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit1.abstract: Sets the form as taking an email for the users login.

Enums/LoginFormType.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit1.name: username
Enums/LoginFormType.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit1.abstract: Sets the form as taking a username for the login

Enums/Element.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit7Elemen.name: colgroup
Enums/Element.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit7Elemen.abstract: For creating a table column group element.

Enums/Element.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit7Elemen.name: th
Enums/Element.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit7Elemen.abstract: For creating a table header cell element.

Enums/Element.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit7Elemen.name: wbr
Enums/Element.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit7Elemen.abstract: For creating a word break opportunity element.

Enums/Dependency.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit10De.name: jQuery
Enums/Dependency.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit10De.abstract: This case is for loading jQuery into a UIWebPage.

Enums/Dependency.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit10De.name: bootstrap
Enums/Dependency.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit10De.abstract: This case is used for loading Twitter Bootstrap into a UIWebPage.

Enums/Dependency.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit10De.name: uiKit
Enums/Dependency.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit10De.abstract: For loading UIKit (the front-end framework) into a UIWebPage.

Enums/Dependency.html#/s:vO8UIWebKit10De.name: htmlTags
Enums/Dependency.html#/s:vO8UIWebKit10De.abstract: Returns a a dictionary with the key as the type of CDN links that are used in the value and the value as an array of Strings that are the CDN links to the dependency.

Enums/DependencyType.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit.name: javaScript
Enums/DependencyType.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit.abstract: Defines the CDN links of the dependency as linking to JavaScript.

Enums/DependencyType.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit.name: css
Enums/DependencyType.html#/s:FO8UIWebKit.abstract: Defines the CDN links of the dependency as linking to CSS.

Enums/DependencyType.html.name: DependencyType
Enums/DependencyType.html.abstract: Although dependencies use more CSS or JavaScript, this enum is used more for adding the CSS of the dependeny to the head of the page and the JavaScript below the footer of the page.

Enums/Dependency.html.name: Dependency
Enums/Dependency.html.abstract: A dependency that a UIWebPage loads in.

Enums/Element.html.name: Element
Enums/Element.html.abstract: All the HTML elements that can be created.

Enums/LoginFormType.html.name: LoginFormType
Enums/LoginFormType.html.abstract: Designates the login that is used for creating the login form.

Classes/UITableCell.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit1.name: cell
Classes/UITableCell.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit1.abstract: The cell that contains the data for the table.

Classes/UITableCell.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit1.name: topLevelElement
Classes/UITableCell.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit1.abstract: The cell contained in the current instance of UITableCell.

Classes/UITableCellHeader.html#/s:vC8UIW.name: cellHeader
Classes/UITableCellHeader.html#/s:vC8UIW.abstract: The header cell that contains the description of the data contained in subsequent cells.

Classes/UITableCellHeader.html#/s:FC8UIW.name: init(with:)
Classes/UITableCellHeader.html#/s:FC8UIW.abstract: Creates a header cell for a table’s header row.

Classes/UITableCellHeader.html#/s:vC8UIW.name: topLevelElement
Classes/UITableCellHeader.html#/s:vC8UIW.abstract: The header cell contained in the current instance of UITableCellHeader.

Classes/UITableRowHeader.html#/s:vC8UIWe.name: rowHeader
Classes/UITableRowHeader.html#/s:vC8UIWe.abstract: The row that contains the header cells.

Classes/UITableRowHeader.html#/s:vC8UIWe.name: cellHeaders
Classes/UITableRowHeader.html#/s:vC8UIWe.abstract: The header cells contained in the header row.

Classes/UITableRowHeader.html#/s:FC8UIWe.name: init(with:)
Classes/UITableRowHeader.html#/s:FC8UIWe.abstract: Creates a header row with cells for an HTML table.

Classes/UITableRow.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit10.name: row
Classes/UITableRow.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit10.abstract: The row that contains the table cells.

Classes/UITableRow.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit10.name: cells
Classes/UITableRow.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit10.abstract: The cells that contain the data for the table.

Classes/UITableRow.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit10.name: init(with:)
Classes/UITableRow.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit10.abstract: Creates a row for an HTML table with cells containing data.`

Classes/UITable.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit7UITa.name: table
Classes/UITable.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit7UITa.abstract: The HTML table. I have nothing else to say.

Classes/UITable.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit7UITa.name: headerRow
Classes/UITable.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit7UITa.abstract: The header row for the HTML table.

Classes/UITable.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit7UITa.name: rows
Classes/UITable.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit7UITa.abstract: The rows of data cells for the table.

Classes/UITable.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit7UITa.name: init(with:)
Classes/UITable.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit7UITa.abstract: Creats a table with rows of data cells and no header.

Classes/UITable.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit7UITa.name: topLevelElement
Classes/UITable.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit7UITa.abstract: The table element that is contained in the UITable.

Classes/UIFormElement.html#/s:vC8UIWebKi.name: topLevelElement
Classes/UIFormElement.html#/s:vC8UIWebKi.abstract: The top level element of the form element. This is the wrapper div.

Classes/UIForm.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit6UIFor.name: form
Classes/UIForm.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit6UIFor.abstract: The HTML form that is the base of the class

Classes/UIForm.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit6UIFor.name: init(with:idPrefix:submitText:and:)
Classes/UIForm.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit6UIFor.abstract: Creates a form with a label and input for each item.

Classes/UIForm.html#/s:ZFC8UIWebKit6UIFo.name: loginForm(with:and:)
Classes/UIForm.html#/s:ZFC8UIWebKit6UIFo.abstract: Creates a form for loging in a user.

Classes/UIForm.html#/s:ZFC8UIWebKit6UIFo.name: signUpForm(with:and:)
Classes/UIForm.html#/s:ZFC8UIWebKit6UIFo.abstract: Creates a basic form for signing up a user.

Classes/UIForm.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit6UIFor.name: topElement
Classes/UIForm.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit6UIFor.abstract: The top level element of the class. In this case, it is the form property.

Classes/UIForm.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit6UIFor.name: topLevelElement
Classes/UIForm.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit6UIFor.abstract: The top level element of UIForm. This is the form property.

Classes/UIWebPage.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit9UI.name: section
Classes/UIWebPage.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: The section between the header and the footer of the page.

Classes/UIWebPage.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.name: init()
Classes/UIWebPage.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: Creates a web page with a head, header, section and footer.

Classes/UIWebPage.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.name: configure()
Classes/UIWebPage.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: For custom configuration of the web page before it is rendered. Over-ride this method to do anything before page rendering.

Classes/UIWebPage.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.name: render()
Classes/UIWebPage.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: Renders the current page to a View with bytes that can be returned from a droplet route.

Classes/UIWebPage.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.name: import(_:)
Classes/UIWebPage.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: Adds dependancies that will be loaded into the webpage.

Classes/UIElement.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit9UI.name: element
Classes/UIElement.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: The element that is returned when the UIElement is parsed.

Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.name: init(element:)
Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: Create an instance of UIElement that is the element passed in.

Classes/UIElement.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit9UI.name: attributes
Classes/UIElement.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: The attributes that are added to the element on parsing.

Classes/UIElement.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit9UI.name: rawElements
Classes/UIElement.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: Child elements that are added in String format. Note that these elements are added as children first.

Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.name: add(_:)
Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: Adds text to an element if it is not an empty element. The text is safety encoded.

Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.name: addRaw(_:)
Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: Adds text to an element if it is not a single tag element. Note that this text is not safety encoded.

Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.name: add(_:)
Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: Adds a child element to an element if it is not an empty element.

Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.name: inject(_:)
Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: Adds a String to the rawElements array if it is not a single tag element.

Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.name: parse()
Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: Creates HTML from the current element and all it’s children. This method is deprecated due to bad naming. Use the render() method instead.

Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.name: render()
Classes/UIElement.html#/s:FC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: Creates HTML from the current element and all it’s children.

Classes/UIElement.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit9UI.name: topLevelElement
Classes/UIElement.html#/s:vC8UIWebKit9UI.abstract: The top level element of the current element. This means self.

Classes/UIElement.html.name: UIElement
Classes/UIElement.html.abstract: A UIElement works as the wrapper for an HTML element.

Classes/UIWebPage.html.name: UIWebPage
Classes/UIWebPage.html.abstract: Represents a web page and contains all the HTML elements.

Classes/UIForm.html.name: UIForm
Classes/UIForm.html.abstract: A wrapper class for an HTML form.

Classes/UIFormElement.html.name: UIFormElement
Classes/UIFormElement.html.abstract: A label and input combonation that is used in a form.

Classes/UITableRowHeader.html.name: UITableRowHeader
Classes/UITableRowHeader.html.abstract: A header row in an HTML table.

Classes/UITableCellHeader.html.name: UITableCellHeader
Classes/UITableCellHeader.html.abstract: Handles the header cell of an HTML table header row.

Classes/UITableCell.html.name: UITableCell
Classes/UITableCell.html.abstract: Handles the cell of a row in an HTML table.

Classes.html.name: Classes
Classes.html.abstract: The following classes are available globally.

Enums.html.abstract: The following enums are available globally.
